Themperror

We need exe memory dump in order to crack the exe. you just need to launch the game, then open task manager and right click on Rocksmith.exe and select create dump file. you'll find the Rocksmith.dmp file in windows temp folder.
cut the first 20MB of the dmp file with hjsplit and pm it to sam2k8 over cs.rin forum.
They have a thread for this game over there.
Seems like you really know what your doing Sam, get this done brother!
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7748964
seed please
Confirmed working.  Follow the steps in Themperror's "crack only" torrent to install and play.  Thanks and much love.

If anyone downloaded this version and Themperror's crack, you can get DLC working by switching the crack with TinyISO's 'crack only' file, so you don't need to redownloaded the whole TinyISO torrent. You still need to create the Content folder under SteamApps/Common/Rocksmith/
